children.value: This document will introduce custom mechanism in G6, including custom node, custom edge, custom behavior, custom layout. All of them are mounted on global G6, called by
When the built-in nodes cannot satisfy your requirments, custom a type of node by
The unique name of the custom node.
The configurations of custom node, include functions of complete life cycles. Please refer to
Specifies the inherited node type of the custom node. Declare this property if you want to extend a built-in node.

/**
     * Draw this type of node with label
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of node
     * @param  {G.Group} group The container of this type of node
     * @return {G.Shape} The keyShape of the type of node. The keyShape can be obtained by node.get('keyShape')
     */

/**
     * Operations to be executed after drawing. No operation by default
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of node
     * @param  {G.Group} group The container of this tyep of node
     */

/**
     * Update the node with label
     * @override
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of node
     * @param  {Node} node The node
     */

/**
     * Operations to be executed after updating.
     * @override
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of node
     * @param  {Node} node The node
     */

/**
     * After graph.setItemState(item, state, value) is called, this function will do some responses.
     * @param  {String} name The name of state
     * @param  {Object} value The value of the state
     * @param  {Node} node The node
     */

/**
     * Get the anchor points
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of node
     * @return {Array|null} The array of anchor points. There is no anchor points if it is null.
     */
When the built-in edges cannot satisfy your requirments, custom a type of edge by
The unique name of the custom edge.
The configurations of custom edge, include functions of complete life cycles. Please refer to
Specifies the inherited node type of the custom node. Declare this property if you want to extend the a built-in edge.

/**
     * Draw this type of edge with label
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of edge
     * @param  {G.Group} group The container of this tyep of edge
     * @return {G.Shape} The keyShape of the type of edge. The keyShape can be obtained by edge.get('keyShape')
     */

/**
     * Operations to be executed after drawing. No operation by default
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of edge
     * @param  {G.Group} group The container of this tyep of edge
     */

/**
     * Update the edge with label
     * @override
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of edge
     * @param  {Edge} edge The edge
     */

/**
     * Operations to be executed after updating.
     * @override
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of edge
     * @param  {Edge} edge The edge
     */

/**
     * After [`graph.setItemState(item, state, value)`] is called, this function will do some responses.
     * @param  {String} name The name of state
     * @param  {Object} value The value of the state
     * @param  {Edge} edge The edge
     */
When the built-in combos cannot satisfy your requirments, custom a type of combo by
The unique name of the custom combo.
The configurations of custom combo, include functions of complete life cycles. Please refer to
Specifies the inherited combo type of the custom combo. Declare this property if you want to extend a built-in combo.

/**
     * Draw this type of combo with label
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of combo
     * @param  {G.Group} group The container of this type of combo
     * @return {G.Shape} The keyShape of the type of combo. The keyShape can be obtained by combo.get('keyShape')
     */

/**
     * Operations to be executed after drawing. No operation by default
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of combo
     * @param  {G.Group} group The container of this tyep of combo
     */

/**
     * Update the combo with label
     * @override
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of combo
     * @param  {Combo} combo The combo
     */

/**
     * Operations to be executed after updating.
     * @override
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of combo
     * @param  {Combo} combo The combo
     */

/**
     * After graph.setItemState(item, state, value) is called, this function will do some responses.
     * @param  {String} name The name of state
     * @param  {Object} value The value of the state
     * @param  {Combo} combo The combo
     */

/**
     * Get the anchor points
     * @param  {Object} cfg The configurations of this type of combo
     * @return {Array|null} The array of anchor points. There is no anchor points if it is null.
     */
cannot satisfy your requirments, custom a type of Behavior by
The configurations of custom Behavior. For more information, please refer to
// Bind the event and its callback

/**
   * Handle the callback for node:click
   * @override
   * @param  {Object} evt The handler
   */

/**
   * Handle the callback for mousemove
   * @override
   * @param  {Object} evt The handler
   */

/**
   * Handle the callback for :click
   * @override
   * @param  {Object} evt The handler
   */
When the built-in Layouts cannot satisfy your requirments, custom a type of Layout by
The name of the custom layout.
The configurations of the custom layout. For more information, please refer to

/**
   * Layout with the data
   * @param {Object} data The data
   */

/**
   * Update the configurations of the layout, but it does not execute the layout
   * @param {Object} cfg The new configurations
   */
